1.1.2.name: wordpress/download-code-redeemer
1.1.2.description:
Download Code Redeemer is a plugin that enables you to have downloads hidden away behind simple authorization. User gets a code, enters it on your website, and the plugin starts a download.

You can create two kinds of codes - single use codes and unlimited use codes.

Download Codes are output as a downloadable CSV file, which makes it very easy to send to printshops for adding to cards or the like.

The redemption form is out via a shortcode.
